Package com.davidbracewell.stream

A unified stream interface that can work across Java and Spark streams.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MDoubleStream
    A facade for double stream classes, such as Java's DoubleStream and Spark's DoubleRDD objects.
    MPairStream<T,U>
    A facade for stream classes which contain key-value pairs.
    MStream<T>
    A facade for stream classes, such as Java's Stream and Spark's RDD objects.
    StreamingContext
    Provides methods for creating MStreams and MAccumulators within a given context, i.e.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocalStream<T>
    A wrapper around Java's Stream class.
    ReusableLocalStream<T>
    A reusable non-distributed stream backed by a collection.
    SparkStream<T>
    A MStream wrapper around a Spark RDD.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LocalStreamingContext
    Represents a local streaming context using Java's built-in streams
    SparkStreamingContext
    Represents a distributed streaming context using Sparks's rdd classes

Package com.davidbracewell.stream Description

A unified stream interface that can work across Java and Spark streams.
